page.title: 12RECREATION IN COLYTON
page.content: In our area there are four football teams,the Colyton Under 12's,Colyton Under 14's,Colyton Under 16's and Colyton men's side. There is a picnic site at Hillhead, looking over Colyton and the Axe Valley. There is a shelter, a number of benches and a map showing the main hills and other features.It was given in memory of Dr.Maclean,a local doctor who died in 1973. There is a playground at Coly Vale which contains swings,slides,a roundabout and two tennis courts. The River Axe is well known for it's bird life and many people also fish there. The Colyton Memorial Hall is used for discos, dances and also it is used for bingo every week. Concerts are occasionally held in the Parish Church.
